paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Decompensated heart failure with reduced ejection fraction, intolerant to guideline-directed medical therapy.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We present a case of a 73-year-old African American male with decompensated heart failure with reduced ejection fraction intolerant to guideline-directed medical therapy who was later found to have cardiac amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The TTR gene mutation leads to the formation of abnormal transthyretin proteins that misfold and deposit in tissues.

key_quotes: Common mutations include Val122ile (V122), Val30Met (V30M), and Thr60Ala (T60A).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one case of TTR-related cardiac amyloidosis was reported without specific variant details.
